subtitleNullable: A collection of preprocessed hand gesture images of 7 types of gestures.
descriptionNullable: Contains 16,000 preprocessed images of 7 hand gestures i.e. fist, five, rad, peace, thumbs, straight, okay. Additionally, contains a none directory with images without any gestures for background initialization. The data can be augmented to enlarge the dataset like in the notebook [Hand Gesture Recognition CNN](https://www.kaggle.com/kritanjalijain/hand-gesture-recognition-cnn)
title: gestures (hand)
subtitle: A collection of preprocessed hand gesture images of 7 types of gestures.
description: Contains 16,000 preprocessed images of 7 hand gestures i.e. fist, five, rad, peace, thumbs, straight, okay. Additionally, contains a none directory with images without any gestures for background initialization. The data can be augmented to enlarge the dataset like in the notebook [Hand Gesture Recognition CNN](https://www.kaggle.com/kritanjalijain/hand-gesture-recognition-cnn)
